entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
